reviewText: Exactly as expected. I have a region-free DVD player so it worked perfectly. This is my favorite movie, so it is really good to have the original release again, since the director's definitive had cut out some lines I rather liked!
can't get original in America on DVD so got British version. Plays like new. I really like the way this movie was shot. Beautiful
This is my favorite movie. I can't even watch it because it's from another country and can't be viewed in this one. Complete waste of money.
